text: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى
translation: Were it not for a prior decree from your Lord[49] [O Prophet] and a time already set, they would have already been punished[50].
footnotes:
[49] That He will not punish until the argument is established on them on the Day of Judgment.
 [50] He would have punished the disbelievers in the life of this world as He did with the destroyed nations of the past.
